name: Aquacreep
description:
"Aquacreep" is a spinoff game set in the "Astrocreep" universe. In this game, play on the side of the HUMANS who are struggling to survive a secret infiltration at sea by the shapeshifting alien. Follow clues to discover who among your research team is really human, and who is really the AQUACREEP in disguise! This game utilizes random elements and your crew responds to your choices. EVERY GAMEPLAY IS DIFFERENT! Fans of the 1982 movie "The Thing", this one's for you ;)

Downloadable fullscreen version of the game for Windows only

NOTE: This game is FREE TO PLAY but I set it to "Pay what you Want" if you feel like tossing me a few bucks the option is there, it is greatly appreciated.

Suits
